m3_agentIntroduce.description: [available] agent introduces his/her name to customer

m3_agentProvidePaymentAmount.description: [testing] does agent provide the payment amount?

m3_agentProvidePaymentDatetime.description: [testing] does agent provide the payment datetime?

m3_askPaymentAmount.description: [available] agent asks the exact amount of money customer will pay

m3_askPaymentDatetime.description: [available] agent asks the exact date customer will go to pay the dept

m3_askPaymentMethod.description: [available] agent asks where customer will come to pay the debt

m3_askPaymentReceipt.description: [available] [if customer already paid] agent asks if customer still keeps the receipt

m3_callClassify.description: [testing] call abnormal cuz customer insulting agent or customer report errors

m3_callHotline.description: [testing] agent tell customer to call hotline

m3_callResult00.description: [not in use] [original version when undefined not appear] check confirm payment status

m3_callResult01.description: [not in use] [remove oh_motivation compared to ver without 0x] check confirm payment status

m3_callResult02.description: [not in use] [original version, adding willpay_summary entity] check confirm payment status

m3_companyName.description: [available] agent tells customer the company's name

m3_confirmCustomer.description: [available] agent confirms customer's name for information assurance

m3_confirmCustomerEC.description: [not in use] agent confirms customer's family's name for information assurance

m3_customerAgree.description: [not in use] customer shows agreement, confirmation, etc.

m3_customerProvidePayment.description: [available] customer provide payment datetime, dont need Request payment

m3_customerProvidePaymentAmount.description: [testing] does customer provide the payment amount?

m3_customerProvidePaymentDatetime.description: [testing] does customer provide the payment datetime?

m3_dropCall.description: [not in use] check endCall normal or not

m3_goodbye.description: [available] agent says goodbye to customer at the end of the call

m3_greet.description: [available] agent greets customer in the beginning of the call

m3_informAmount.description: [not in use] customer's loan amount, or the amount that customer is going to pay

m3_informLoan.description: [available] agent informs customer about their loan

m3_informOverdue.description: [available] number of days that customer fail to pay the instalment

m3_objectHandling.description: [not in use] agent greets customer in the beginning of the call

m3_oh1.description: [available] agent greets customer in the beginning of the call

m3_oh2.description: [available] agent greets customer in the beginning of the call

m3_permitToEnd.description: [testing] agent want to end a hopeless call

m3_requestPayment.description: [available] agent asks customer to pay the dept today or tomorrow and customer response them

m3_secureInfo.description: [not in use] agent informs customer that they need to confirm customer's name for security reason

m3_sumWC.description: [available] agent summay wc for calling to wrong number

m3_thank.description: [available] agent says thank to customer at the end of call

m3_validMotivation.description: [testing] call contains both motivation title and result

m3_wrongNumber.description: [available] agent sorry for calling to wrong number
